channel.title: D-family on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in D-family on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Daylight
item.description: Night, no one ever talks at night Darkness hardly gives advice Quietly it rolls the dice There’s no time but running sand Come, silence’s hard to bear alone Darkness has no word to say Two is power to obey Two is better anyway Daylight will shelter us once more Three words we’ve heard before Those words that are spoken by time Despite of silence without cause and hesitation walls We simply chat away just because Morn came rather grey and bleak today Mirror mirror on the wall Tell me where it all has gone Nightly kisses I adore So music played by you is gone Dawn keeps secert of the night Quiet touch of misty lips Paved the way for our good bye Daylight will shelter us once more Three words we’ve heard before Those words that are spoken by time Despite of silence without cause and hesitation walls We simply chat away just because Daylight will shelter us once more Three words we’ve heard before Those words that are spoken by time Despite of silence without cause and hesitation walls We simply chat away just because Daylight
